AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assassin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Sometimes all that was needed was a silent blade, that was when someone like [PAWN_nameDef] was called into action. [PAWN_nameDef] would silently climb the side of a ship, sneak into the targets quarters, and then vanish, back into the depths. No one on board any the wiser that that a crew member was no longer with them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: commander
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As somewhat of a veteran, [PAWN_nameDef] had the privilege of commanding new recruits, ensuring they survive their first attempted invasion of Summerset, or at least returned in one piece.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: serpent knight
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the famed serpent knights, highly skilled warriors that rode sea serpents into battle, with a little help from a nearby snake mage of course. Alas [PAWN_possessive] fighting days have been over for a while, as [PAWN_possessive] beloved serpent steed is sadly no more.
